data.title: The Avengers
data.synopsis: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team to save the world from Loki and his army.

data.title: The Shawshank Redemption
data.synopsis: Two imprisoned men bond over several years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

data.title: Inception
data.synopsis: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

data.title: The Dark Knight
data.synopsis: When the menace known as The Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.
